scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,web,ui-shell -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm exec ts-node apps/server/src/index.ts" "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/web dev" "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/ui-shell watch"
scripts.dev:mcp: concurrently -n server,mcp,web,ui-shell -c blue,magenta,green,yellow "pnpm exec ts-node apps/server/src/index.ts" "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/mcp-server start:http" "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/web dev" "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/ui-shell watch"
scripts.dev:mcp-only: concurrently -n mcp,web,ui-shell -c magenta,green,yellow "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/mcp-server start:http" "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/web dev" "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/ui-shell watch"
scripts.dev:simple: concurrently -n server,web -c blue,green "pnpm exec ts-node apps/server/src/index.ts" "pnpm --filter @sdd-bundle-editor/web dev"
scripts.kill:servers: pkill -f 'mcp-server' 2>/dev/null; pkill -f webpack 2>/dev/null; pkill -f 'ts-node' 2>/dev/null; echo 'Stale servers killed'
